ATTENTION!!!!

I rarely comment in Bay, but this time i just feel obligated to...

This is a B class movie.

Oh, Bruce Willis, what have you done?!?
Never seen Bruce participating in anything low quality before. This movie forced him to overdo on acting and reacting like some amateur.

Movie tries to hold on to Guy Riccie (Snatch, Lock Stock and Two smoking barrels) style which i personally found just insulting due to how horrifyingly distasteful and inappropriately it has been performed.

Movie is produced by 50 cent (obviously). Poor guy can't get into any A class movies, so he buys a script that was thrown away by all of the biggest film producers and studios and produces it himself just to appear on a screen.

Only good thing this movie has is Ryan Phillipe. Guy is very talented and took the role seriously. Instead of Bruce Willis who casts an impression that he already knows that movie is going to suck ass and seems to have a sarcastic attitude towards it with a face expression:
"Hey, 50 just paid me 10 mil just to drop four lines here and appear in credits!"

In summary, not only this B class movie is bad even for B class, but it made me so angry that i just had to warn every self respecting cinematography appreciator that this is predictable crap, with crappy acting, insufficient budget, no film director (or one that is forced to work a certain way) and no script. Atleast no script with actual story in it besides making 50 cent look bad ass and Ryan Phillipe saying: "He's a hothead! He will come to a front door..."

Painful to watch...

P.S. Torrent it self is ok though. Would not expect anything else from EZ.
